import React from 'react'; import {useState} from 'react'; import Logo from '../images/logo.svg'; const EditActivity = (props) => { const [state, setState] = useState({ activityType: "Match", taskType: "Translate", distractors: "2", verb: "recall" }) const onChangeHandler = (event) => { setState({ ...setState, [event.target.name]:event.target.value }) } return (

Elizabeth Wilkinson

Course Creator

COURSES ELEMENTARY SPANISH 1 OBJECTIVE NAME
EDIT ACTIVITY

Activity Editor View

{state.activityType}
Option 1
Option 2
{state.taskType}
Option 1
Option 2
) } export default EditActivity;
